column4: need help! have windows installed on first HD, ubuntu WAS on the second, from windows I reformatted the second drive and now grub is just throwing an error
how do I get it to just start windows?
need help! have windows installed on first HD, ubuntu WAS on the second, from windows I reformatted the second drive and now grub is just throwing an error
you need to modify your /boot/grub/menu.lst file
